title: Do not kill pages before you verify that on your site references properly updated.
body:
Do not kill pages before you verify that on your site references properly updated.
I was sent to page to download IE 10 from one of your own searches, result - page does not exists. It is really dumb to have something in search and sent people there while you already kill resource. And message there is at least unapropriate, but get plus for sense of humor.
